1114285596162252800.text:
Time to do this again! I'm happy to RT your tech blog post. If you don't have one, write one!

Requirements:
1. You identify as a woman
2. Post is on a technical topic (not hiring, communication, diversity, your story, etc)
3. No self deprecation
4. Include title in tweet + link

It's your turn.

1108787675635609601.text: imo it can be really hard for people to see what they're doing that's AMAZING and giving people feedback about what specifically they're doing well is extremely constructive :)

1108777589538209792.text: i get so mad when people use "constructive feedback" as a synonym for "negative feedback". positive feedback can be super constructive & useful!!!! (eg "you're awesome at X but you rarely do it, I want to see more of X from you!")
